cast.name: Shmil Ben Ari Shmil Ben Ari

introduction: 罗伊和父母在海滩上度过了漫长而炎热的一天。当他让他爸爸承诺带一点沙子回家作为纪念品时，这个家庭发现自己身处一个军事禁区——这是一个非常危险的情况。To mark the 30th anniversary of the Jerusalem Sam Spiegel Film School (JSFS), Generation is devoting a short film programme to the outstanding work of this Israeli film school. Co-curated by Renen Schorr, founding director of the JSFS, and Maryanne Redpath, head of Generation, the programme presents six short films from the years 1997 to 2015 and examines the lives of young Israelis, which have been shaped by conflict and siege: A Scarred Generation.Roy has spent a long, hot day with his parents at the beach. When he makes his dad promise to take home a little sand as a keepsake, the family finds itself in the midst of a restricted military area – and a very risky situation.
